profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.8 Images - Interpolate
profile.description: If an Image dictionary contains the Interpolate key, its value shall be false. For an inline image, the I key shall have a value of false.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: If an Image dictionary contains the Interpolate key, its value shall be false. For an inline image, the I key shall have a value of false.

error.message: The value of the Interpolate key in the Image dictionary is true
